welcome_message_title: Welcome to Pilar de la Horadada
welcome_message_body: "Welcome to charming Pilar de la Horadada, Spain! Known for its beautiful beaches and rich history, we invite you to explore and enjoy all that our city has to offer. We hope you have a delightful stay with us."

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at San Javier Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at San Javier Airport, used for regional and low-cost carrier flights.

wifi.note: Free wifi service is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Corvera International Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Corvera International Airport, mainly used for low-cost and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
